attributes.action: Giving Parents Options to Keep Children at Home While Keeping Schools Open
attributes.additional_details: By doing so, social interactions in schools will be greatly reduced, so will Covid-19 transmission. The risks of teachers and children catching the virus will be cut down. Vulnerable parents or grandparents will be protected. At the same time, children (both at home or in school) will be educated as well.
attributes.background: Encourage parents to keep children at home if they can provide education for them, trusting parents as responsible adults, being able to make sensible/best decisions for their children and their families during this pandemic based on their specific situations.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551740
